body_html: At this point I'm going to remove tests_require too. I'm a bit concerned about all of the additional deps in install_requires as well, especially since we want to have FULL_CAFFE2=1 in all cases shortly. Is it better to just not have these (similar to PyTorch) and just have the user install them as needed? Or, alternatively, have them in requirements.txt. I like that last option, honestly.

body: At this point I'm going to remove `tests_require` too. I'm a bit concerned about all of the additional deps in `install_requires` as well, especially since we want to have FULL_CAFFE2=1 in all cases shortly. Is it better to just not have these (similar to PyTorch) and just have the user install them as needed? Or, alternatively, have them in requirements.txt. I like that last option, honestly.
